title: 7 - Jesus The Refugee And The Christian Fear Complex
description:
In this episode we discuss Christmas presents;  Jesus the refugee, politics and the Syrian refugee crisis; and how much some of Christian culture has invested in keeping us afraid.  As always, please leave your thoughts and questions in the comments below!

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - http://apple.co/1Lla1Nj
